text: Andrew Egan Henderson Hendry who is known as Drew Hendry is a Scottish politician and Internet marketer. He is a Member of Parliament from the Scottish National Party. Drew Hendry grew up in Edinburgh. According to him, his interest in politics was sparked by the fact that during his teenage years, he was too young to vote in the Scottish referendum of 1979. However, he started his career as an employee of Electrolux. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Internet marketing people Category:Politicians from Edinburgh Category:1964 births Category:Scottish National Party MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Scottish constituencies
title: Drew Hendry
